availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Warren County, Kentucky, farmer. Warren County, Kentucky, native. Son of Robert F. Claspill and Rachael Claspill. Married to Jennetta Harlow Claspell in Warren County, Kentucky, in August 1857. Father of James Claspell and Maggie Claspell. Farmer in Warren County in 1850. Farmer in Warren County in 1860. Farmer in Warren County in 1864.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Warren County, District No 2, p. 67B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Warren County, District No 1, p. 106.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Warren County, Lucus Precinct, p. 227A.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Warren County, KY, February 1864, p. 22.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Warren County Marriages, Film #000164008.
